name: Lawnmower Defense
description:
LAWNMOWER  - DEFENSE

Quick! You just received a letter from the High-Council, warning you of the hordes of possessed lawnmowers that are ravaging the country. Luckily you can take control of the battle-carrots that are growing in your garden. Defend yourself and survive for three waves of ruthless, lawn-mowing enemies!

- 1. drag and move your tools (seeds, hoe) over the two fields to plant carrots

- 2. take a cloud from the sky to water them

- 3. Click the right mouse button on the location, where you want to place your brave carrot-soldiers

Have fun :)
